long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How many times have you got Rickrolled? 

Features:
- Displays an alert when the extension detects that you've been Rickrolled.
- View the total number of times you've been Rickrolled on the current browser in the extension popup.

Disclaimer:
A Rickroll is only detected when navigating to the original Rickroll video from a different link. A Rickroll will not be detected if:
- Rickroll tab is closed, then reopened again using Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + T.
- Link to the video is opened in a new window.
- Video is opened in Incognito.
- Refreshing the original Rickroll video.
